title: News reports from France. [No. 72/80] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. Germaine Richier 1904-1959, French sculptor - by Yves Allain, Jean-Claude Maillet. 2. Lille Roubaix Tourcoing by Carlos Vilardebo - a town in France and its industries. 3. Ars Antica by Jacques Scandelari - a music group play music spanning five centuries. 4. Le Maire de Douelle. Dans le depart ement du lot by Jacques Scandelari - about the Mayor of the town.
